name: Hairband Of Stars  / Star Hairband
description: A headgear that a little girl would like, star shaped. Applicable Pet :  Marionette

name: Tail Whip
description: A whip fashioned out of an animal's tail that is said to bring good luck. LUK + 3

name: Yam
description: A kind of plant root used as food. It's advised to eat this slowly with water, or to bake it beforehand. Restores a great amount of HP .

name: Kafra Item Mall Prize Package
description: Elegant Shaped Pet Egg Scroll. User will receive various interesting items. (All transfer methods except Kafra Storage are locked) Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Abysmal Knight Card
description: Increase damage on Boss monster by 25%.

name: Jakk Card
description: Increase resistance to the  Fire  Property by 30%. FLEE +5

name: Sacred Arrow
description: Arrows make by the great smith in town. Sacred weapon as said by Hou Yi.

name: T Sunglasses  / [Costume] Sunglasses
description: Glasses with special, darkened lenses that block ultraviolet light.

name: Quagmire Scroll 30 Box  / Quagmire Scroll Box(30)
description: A box containing 30 Quagmire Scroll. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Lance
description: Rental Items A spear that is commonly used by mounted knights. Increases physical damage against  Small, Medium and Large  size monsters by 50%. When VIP status is active: ATK +10, MATK +10.
item_script: { bonus2 bAddSize,Size_All,50; if (vip_status(VIP_STATUS_ACTIVE)) { bonus bBaseAtk,10; bonus bMatk,10; } },{},{}

name: Obsidian Dagger
description: A dagger made from a mysterious black stone called "Obsidian". Although the blade is made from stone, it cuts well.

name: Daehwandan  / Gold Pill 1
description: A pill made by preparing various herbal medicines and herbs in a specific combination. Only one of Eastern religious group can create this.  MaxHP +5%, Natural HP regeneration +10% for 1 hour.

name: Yellow Butterfly Wing  / [Event]Yellow Butterfly Wing
description: A Yellow Butterfly wing that can take you to any of the towns in the Rune Midgard Continent. Great for getting to leveling places and completing Job change quests. May be put in Storage.   Locations: Prontera, Geffen, Payon, Morocc, Al De Baran or Alberta when waved in the air.  Warning: If no town is selected in 1 minute, the item will disappear.

name: Pagdayaw
description: An headgear which is made of many kinds of property rings. It looks very luxurious and charming. Add a 5% chance of auto casting  Level 1 Scream  on an enemy when attacking.

name: Gakkung Bow
description: A bow made famous by its use by Goongso, a legendary Korean archer that used this bow's power to smite his enemies.

name: Lance
description: A spear that is commonly used by mounted knights.

name: Hahoe Mask
description: A traditional Korean Hahoe mask made by carefully carving a smiling face. You can feel the emotions of the wearer just by looking at it. [ Taekwon Classes ] LUK + 1, Perfect Dodge + 2 More Information on Combo: Hahoe Mask & Dark Pumpkin-head Hahoe Mask & Witch's Pumpkin Hat
item_script: { if (BaseClass == Job_Taekwon) { bonus bLuk,1; bonus bFlee2,2; } },{},{}

name: Tablet
description: A marble tablet on which the wise words of the ancients have been engraved and immortalized.

name: Valentine Gift Box
description: A box containing a ring which is an exchanging gift for Valentine's Day.

name: Kafra Card Box
description: A box containing 10 Kafra Name Cards. Kafra Name Card - Summons the Kafra Service when used. This will open all 3 storages.

name: Yao Jun Card
description: FLEE +15 Critical Rate + 1 [ + Munak & Bongun Card ] All Stats + 1 More Information on Combo: Munak Card, Bongun Card & Hyegun Card

name: E Cloth Dye Coupon2
description: Not Available [iRO Description] Not Available

name: Safety Helmet
description: A durable safety helmet created to offer some protection from accidents. MDEF + 3 Indestructible (except in upgrade attempts).

name: Lady Solace Card
description: [ Priest classes ] Adds a 2% chance of autocasting  Level 5 Grand Cross  when dealing physical attack.

name: Ice Crystal
description: A transparent ice crystal.

name: Zephyrus
description: A spear imbued with the  Wind  Property. Add a 10% chance of auto casting  Level 3 Thunder Storm  on the enemy when attacking. Causes  Silence  effect to enemies by 2% chance.
item_script: { bonus bAtkEle,Ele_Wind; bonus2 bAddEff,Eff_Silence,200; bonus3 bAutoSpell,"MG_THUNDERSTORM",3,100; },{},{}

name: Baby Chick Hat Box  / Chick Hat Box
description: A box contains 1 Baby Chick. A hat with cute little chick on it. It's hopping action is so cute. Allows usage  Level 2 Double Attack , and if you already know higher than  Level 2 Double Attack , then the appropriate level will be used instead. Reduce damage from DemiHuman monster by 3%. Impossible to refine this item. Max HP, Max SP + 50, Luk + 2. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Kafra Card
description: Kafra name card issued by the Kafra Center. The Kafra will be in service once the call is made.

name: Underripe Yggseed  / Unripe Yggdrasil Seed
description: A lesser seed of Yggdrasil. Restore HP and SP by 30%. Cast Level 3  Blessing .

name: Haedonggum
description: An one-handed, ancient Korean sword that is said to have the mysterious power to control minds. INT + 3

name: Neatly Sliced Rice Cake
description: A bag of sliced rice cake. Can be cooked in various ways.

name: Panacea
description: A mystic remedy for all illnesses. Cures Poison, Curse, Silence, Confusion, Blind and Illusion (Hallucination).
item_script: { sc_end SC_POISON; sc_end SC_SILENCE; sc_end SC_BLIND; sc_end SC_CONFUSION; sc_end SC_CURSE; sc_end SC_Hallucination; },{},{}

name: Kafra Card 50 Box  / Kafra Card Box(50)
description: A box containing 50 Kafra Cards. Kafra Card - Kafra will be in service when used. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Wanderer's Sakkat
description: A rustic hat made of bamboo that was worn by a heroic wandering adventurer. It shadows your eyes with its wide brim. Flee +3, When refined to +7 or higher, AGI +2, Flee +2. When refined to +9 or higher, CRIT +10, ASPD +8%. More Information on Combo: Coat Of Wandering[1] & Wanderer's Sakkat[1]
item_script: { bonus bFlee,3; .@r = getrefine(); if (.@r>=7) { bonus bFlee,2; bonus bAgi,2; } if (.@r>=9) { bonus bCritical,10; bonus bAspdRate,8; } },{},{}

name: Queen's Hair Ornament
description: A hair accessory, said to be worn by an ancient queen, that is fitting for vain, yet glamorous, Cute Pets. Applicable Pet :  Isis

name: Sacrifice Ring
description: Not much is known about the mysterious Sacrifice Ring. When your HP reaches 0, the ring is destroyed and your HP is restored to 50% (Not confirmed!)

name: Hakujin
description: A dagger that has a shining white blade crafted of bone, and is designed for stabbing, rather than slashing. Add a 1% chance of auto casting  Level 1 Heal  on the user when attacking.

name: Baby Pacifier
description: A hat that looks just like a pacifier. Wearing it really brings you back to the good old days of hanging in the crib.

name: Dagger of Hunter
description: Specialized in back-stabbing. This dagger is customized for stalkers. STR +1, AGI +2, DEX +1 Increase Back Stab skill damage by 20%. When using Back Stab skill, has a chance of activating Level 10 Bash.
item_script: { bonus bStr,1; bonus bAgi,2; bonus bDex,1; bonus4 bAutoSpellOnSkill,"RG_BACKSTAP","SM_BASH",10,100; bonus2 bSkillAtk,"RG_BACKSTAP",20; },{},{}

name: Valentine's Day Firecracker Box
description: A box containing 10 Valentine Firecracker. Phrase 'HAPPY VALENTINE's DAY!' pops out with Fire cracker. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Saber
description: A heavy one-handed cavalry sword with a slightly curved blade.

name: X Hairpin
description: A hair accessory that looks like an 'X'.

name: Mage Book Misc
description: Not Available [iRO Description] Not Available

name: Baby Dragon Hat
description: A baby dragon who has been trained to help its master. DEX +2 Enables Level 5 Double Attack (When you learn a higher level, activate the corresponding level).

name: Damascus
description: A lethal knife made of a special metal that can easily cut straight into the heart of an enemy. Indestructible (except in upgrade attempts).

name: La'cryma Stick
description: Decorated with animal tails, it symbolizes a staff frequently used by a great magician. Strengthens the ice element magic, Storm Gust. INT +4, MATK +180.  For every refine level, MDEF +1 and  Stormgust  damage +1%.  When refined to +10 or higher, variable cast time of  Stormgust  reduces by 8%. More Information on Combo: La'cryma Stick[2] & Geffenia Water Book
item_script: { .@r = getrefine(); bonus bInt,4; bonus bMdef,.@r; bonus2 bSkillAtk,"WZ_STORMGUST",.@r; if (.@r > 9) bonus2 bVariableCastrate,"WZ_STORMGUST",-8; },{},{}

name: Laboratory Permit
description: A pass for Regenschirm Laboratory employees that should allow you access around the lab.

name: Undine Box
description: A box contains 4 'Laurell Weinder' Card. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Hairband Of Reginleif  / Reginrev's Wings
description: A head accessory which is named after Valkyrie Reginleif. If someone wear this, they can get the bless of god. Increase resistance against  Water ,  Fire ,  Undead and Ghost  Property by 3%.
item_script: { bonus2 bSubEle,Ele_Water,3; bonus2 bSubEle,Ele_Fire,3; bonus2 bSubEle,Ele_Undead,3; bonus2 bSubEle,Ele_Ghost,3; },{},{}

name: Quadrille
description: A heavy and powerful iron mace with a rounded top. Increases physical damage against  Earth  elemental monsters by 10%. Increases physical damage against  Undead  and  DemiHuman  monsters by 10%.
item_script: { bonus2 bAddRace,RC_DemiHuman,10; bonus2 bAddRace,RC_Player_Human,10; bonus2 bAddEle,Ele_Undead,10; bonus2 bAddEle,Ele_Earth,10; },{},{}

name: Undershirt
description: Lightweight armor made from 100% real cotton that is actually quite durable. MDEF + 1 [ + Pantie ] AGI + 5, FLEE +10. More Information on Combo: Pantie & Undershirt[1]  Pantie[1] & Undershirt[1]

name: Aspersio Scroll Lv 5
description: Not Available [iRO Description] A scroll in which a single use of Level 5 Aspersio has been recorded. If there is no Holy Water, scroll will be damaged when used. Caution-- This item won't work while your character is casting a spell or skill. Account Bound

name: I Love You
description: A cushion embroidered with the words 'I love you'. Today's saying is written on the back. 'I only looked up at the roof to see a dog that was chasing a chicken.'

name: Wanderer Egg
description: An egg in which a Wanderer Cute Pet rests.  Can be hatched by using a  Pet Incubator . AGI +3.

name: Vadon Card
description: Increase damage inflicted on  Fire  Property monsters by 20%.

name: Dagger of Counter  / Counter Dagger
description: A dagger that has a high chance to do critical damage to a target. CRIT +90

name: Neat Report
description: Very nicely sorted document file. A small thanks note is attached on the bottom of the file.

name: Ice Fireworks
description: A flame shaped ice. Strange. Imps are drawn to its flame.

name: Ragamuffin Manteau
description: An old, worn-out cape that can protect its wearer from mystical harm, no matter how powerful it may be. MDEF + 10 Indestructible (except in upgrade attempts).

name: F Abrasive  / Abrasive
description: An abrasive that adds sharpness to a weapon. CRIT +30 Duration : 5 Minutes.

name: Academy Freshman Hat  / Clergyman Grad Hat
description: Academy Freshman Hat! You must to say hello to the Academy members. INT +1, VIT +1, DEX +2 Reduces after cast delay by 5%.
item_script: { bonus bInt,1; bonus bDex,2; bonus bVit,1; bonus bDelayrate,-5; },{},{}

name: Zeny Knife
description: A dagger that steals Zeny from monsters upon their defeat.

name: Baby Desert Wolf Card
description: INT + 1 More Information on Combo: Baby Desert Wolf Card & Corrupt Life Card

name: Rabbit Bonnet
description: A Bonnet looks like a cute rabbit that made by legendary hat maker.  It looks so soft and weak but it might have extraordinary things inside of it. INT + 2 Reduces after-cast skill delay by 3%.

name: T Cigarette  / [Costume] Cigarette
description: A narrow, short roll of finely cut tobacco wrapped in thin paper.

name: W Doll Hat
description: So hot! A headgear with the figure of Kafra W! There is a rumor that an assassin association wants to scout her, because there are so many guys who become frightened and faint when she calls them. Reduces damage from Demihuman monster by 5%. Increases physical and magical damage to the Undead monster by 5%. Impossible to refine this item.
item_script: { bonus2 bSubRace,RC_DemiHuman,5; bonus2 bSubRace,RC_Player_Human,5; bonus2 bAddRace,RC_Undead,5; bonus2 bMagicAddRace,RC_Undead,5; },{},{}

name: Navel Ring
description: A navel ring, one of popular body piercing jewelry among females. Dex +3, Luk +3, MDEF +2
item_script: { bonus bDex,3; bonus bLuk,3; bonus bMdef,2; },{},{}

name: Navy Beret  / Navy Blue Beret
description: This is a navy blue beret worn by the elite soldiers of the Navy of Alberta. It is very effective when battling pirates on the high seas. Reduces damage taken from DemiHuman monsters by 10%.

name: Lantern of Hope
description: A coconut oil lamp in which a dim light that repels evil is burning. STR + 2, Add a 10% resistance against  Blind .

name: Zenorc Card
description: When dealing physical attack, has a 4% chance to  Poison  the target.  ATK + 10

name: Abrasive 5 Box  / Abrasive Box(5)
description: A box containing 5 Abrasive. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Xmas Firecracker
description: Phrase 'MERRY CHRISTMAS!' pops out with Fire cracker. Flammable. Keep out of reach of children.

name: Raggler Card
description: STR + 1 VIT + 1 [ Zipper Bear, Hylozoist, Myst Case & Baby Leopard Card Combo ] More Information on Combo: Muka Card, Raggler Card, Baby Leopard Card, Zipper Bear Card & Holden Card Raggler Card, Myst Case Card, Baby Leopard Card, Zipper Bear Card & Hylozoist Card

name: Obsidian Card
description: Every 18 Base DEX, you gain 1 VIT.

name: Ungoliant Card
description: Gain immunity to the  Bleeding  status. HP Recovery + 10%

name: Jaguar Hat
description: A mask of the king of the amazon Jungle, known as Jaguar. The person who equip it is rumored to receive a blessing of nature. MDEF + 2. Enables use of  Level 1 Crazy Uproar .

name: Ulle's Cap
description: A woolen hunting cap once worn by Ulle, god of hunting. Just wearing it makes you feel like you can hunt down any beast. DEX + 2, AGI + 1 [ + Odin's Blessing ] [ Base Dexterity >= 70 ] Reduce SP Consumption of skills by 10%. More Information on Combo: Odin's Blessing[1] & Ulle's Cap[1]

name: Omni Clothing Dye
description: If you give this coupon to the Stylist Dinorah Lacostt at Prontera or Paradise Group Headquarters, she will dye your costume to 1 of 3 different color variations. This item can be traded, stored, and vended "

name: Yellow Butterfly Wing
description: Allows teleportation to any Rune-Midgarts city. Available cities are Prontera, Geffen, Payon, Morroc, Aldebaran, and Alberta.

name: Zephyrus
description: A spear imbued with the  Wind  Property. Add a 10% chance of auto casting  Level 3 Thunder Storm  on the enemy when attacking. Causes  Silence  effect to enemies by 2% chance.
item_script: { bonus bAtkEle,Ele_Wind; bonus2 bAddEff,Eff_Silence,200; bonus3 bAutoSpell,"MG_THUNDERSTORM",3,100; },{},{}

name: Yellow Butterfly Wing Box
description: A box containing 10 Yellow Butterfly Wing.  Allows teleportation to any Rune-Midgarts city. Available cities are Prontera, Geffen, Payon, Morroc, Aldebaran, and Alberta. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Dagger
description: Knife used for stabbing.

name: Gambler Hat
description: It looks like a normal hat from the outside, but in reality it's modified especially for gamblers. LUK + 5

name: F B Mdef Potion  / Large Magic Defense Potion
description: A secret potion made using pixie mustache. Adds 3% resistance to Magical Attacks. Duration : 3 minutes.

name: Xmas Gift
description: It is rumored that you can get this box once a year.  If you cry, you are excluded from the list.

name: F Adrenaline Scroll  / LV5 Adrenaline Scroll
description: A scroll in which a single use of Level 5 Adrenaline Rush has been recorded. If the user is not equipped with an Axe, the scroll will be when used.

name: Umbrella Hat
description: A fancy umbrella that doesn't need a hand and is very handy during monsoon. It prevents you getting wet and also gives you a festival mood. Reduces  Water  Property damage by 3%.

name: Cacao Bean
description: A fermented dry cacao bean.

name: Raccoon Leaf
description: A leaf that gives Smokies the power to change form and become invisible.

name: Vagabond's Skull
description: A remains of someone. Wanderer finds it to be very tasty.

name: Jamadhar
description: A specially made katar with two blades that move like scissors to reveal a third blade from within.

name: Raccoon Hat
description: A hat created in the form of Smokie, the Raccoon monster.

name: Mace Of Madness
description: Rental Item Mace of Insanity. Increases 25% damage with  Cart Revolution  skill. STR + 2.

name: Galapago Cap
description: A cute looking cap that makes its wearer look just like Galapago the penguin, and the rim, which looks like a beak, actually blocks UV rays. Has a low chance of gaining the 'Anodyne' item each time a monster is killed.

name: F Agi Dish10  / Steamed Desert Scorpions
description: This scorpion dish is cooked with the heat of the desert sand, and is one of the four best dishes in Sograt Desert cuisine. AGI + 10 Duration : 30 minutes.

name: Calender December  / December Calendar
description: A calender with 'December' word written on it. This is the month when kids and adults ca have an exciting day.

name: Jacket
description: A jacket made out of mediocre leather.

name: Saber
description: A heavy one-handed cavalry sword with a slightly curved blade.

name: Valentine Gift Box
description: A box containing a ring which is an exchanging gift for Valentine's Day.

name: Quagmire Scroll 10 Box  / Quagmire Scroll Box(10)
description: A box containing 10 Quagmire Scroll. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: I Love You Firecracker
description: Phrase 'I LOVE YOU!' pops out with Fire cracker. Flammable. Keep out of reach of children.

name: Quagmire Scroll 10 Box  / Quagmire Scroll Box(10)
description: A box containing 10 Quagmire Scroll. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: F B Def Potion  / Big Defense Potion
description: A secret potion made using tough dragon scales. Adds 3% resistance to Physical Attacks. Duration : 3 minutes.

name: F Old Bubble Gum  / Old Bubble Gum
description: Sweet, tasty bubble gum. Item drop rate increases by 100% for 30 minutes. 150% for 30 minutes until 12/13/2011

name: Kafra Card Box
description: A box containing 10 Kafra Cards. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Sacred Scroll  / Holy Aspersio Scroll
description: Scroll that has the record of using  Level 5 Aspersio . Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Tae Goo Lyeon
description: This is known as the sword of a brave man from the orient. Perfect Dodge +10. If  Job Level  at least  70  (50 if 3rd jobs): Randomly increases ATK +50 for 10 seconds when dealing physical attack. Refine Level  +9 : Reduces SP cost by 20%. Reduces after cast delay by 20%.
item_script: { bonus bFlee2,10; if (JobLevel>=70   (eaclass()&EAJL_THIRD && JobLevel>=50)) autobonus "{ bonus bBaseAtk,50; }",10,10000,BF_WEAPON,"{ specialeffect2 EF_POTION_BERSERK; }"; if (getrefine()>8) { bonus bDelayrate,-20; bonus bUseSPrate,-20; } },{},{}

name: Taecheongdan
description: A pill made from various magical medicines.  MaxSP +5%, Natural SP regeneration +10% for 1 hour.  Duration:  60  minutes

name: Cactus Hat  / Potted Muka Hat
description: The friendly Potted Muka likes to encourage you by aggravating your opponents! Adds a chance a defeated  Plant  monster will drop  Cactus Needle . (Select to show Pre-RE or iRO description for different effect). Unrefineable

name: F Clothing Dye Coupon2  / Original Clothing Dye Coupon
description: If you give this coupon to the NPC, she will dye your costume to its original color.

name: Sabbath
description: An axe which is said to eradicate the darkness in mislead hearts and guide them to the afterlife.  Increases critical attack on  Undead  monster by 50%. Causes  Coma  effect on  Demon  monster by a low chance.
item_script: { bonus bAtkEle,Ele_Dark; bonus2 bComaRace,RC_Demon,50; bonus2 bCriticalAddRace,RC_Undead,50; },{},{}

name: Abrasive
description: An abrasive that adds sharpness to a weapon. For 5 minutes, the player will receive +30 Critical Rate. This rate is doubled by Katar weapons.

name: Hairstyle Coupon
description: A special ticket where you can change yours hairstyle with newest model. One time use only.

name: Ube Jam
description: A jar of "Ube" made from yummy sweet purple yams.

name: Blessing Scroll Lv 10  / [Event] LV10 Blessing Scroll
description: This item is impossible to deal with another account. Reward from Event A scroll in which a single use of Level 10 Blessing has been recorded. Caution!- Casts [Blessing] Lv 10 on the user when used.

name: Lantern
description: A portable case with glass panes that allow some contained light to illuminate dark areas.

name: Tailring Doll Hat Box  / Telling Doll Hat Box
description: A box which contains 1 Tailring Doll Hat. So hot! A headgear with the figure of Kafra Telling! She is such an active and hard-working lady. So she became the most favorite Kafra among users. Decreases damage taken from  DemiHuman  race by 5%. Increases recovery amount gained from  White Potion  and  White Slim Potion  by 10%. UnRefineable. Slot [1] This item is not refundable.

name: Mace
description: A flanged, solid club that is effective for simple smashing.

name: Abundance
description: Not Available [iRO Description] Not Available

name: Ice Cream
description: Deliciously frosty ice cream that can cause brain freeze if you eat too much too quickly. Recovers a suitable amount of HP .

name: Mage Book Practice
description: Not Available [iRO Description] Not Available

name: Neck of Demon Dragon
description: The supply and demand of the dreaded Maryong, both eyes are full of revenge and anger, and it seems that they are emitting sparks even now.

name: Incense Bag
description: A small item that wishes for good luck.

name: Waghnak
description: A common, yet effective claw that's also known as the "Tiger Fang".

name: Galion Card
description: HIT +5.   Increase damage on  Water  Property monsters by 5%.

name: Nauthiz Rune  / Nosiege Runestone
description: Casts 'Refresh', removing all abnormal stat and debuffs. Prevents any abnormal state or debuff effects for 60 seconds. Recovers 25%  HP  and can be used while  Stunned, Frozen  or  Deep Sleep  status. Removeable Debuffs: Stun, Sleep, Curse, Petrification, Poison, Blind, Silence, Bleeding, Confusion, Frozen, Deep Sleep, Burning, Freezing,Guillotine Cross Poisons, Marsh of Abyss and Mandragora Howling. (This item has a cooldown of 2 minutes and a maximum carry capacity of 60.)

name: Kafra Legend Vol.1
description: A famous novel by a kRO player that was published in Monthly RO that's about the Kafra Corporation.

name: Maamoul
description: Not Available [iRO Description] Not Available

name: T Valkyrie Feather Band  / [Costume] Valkyrie Feather Band
description: A hairband utilizing a Feather from a Valkyrie Angel.

name: Hagalaz Rune  / Hagalas Runestone
description: Casts 'Stonehard Skin', changing your skin into a solid shell.  For 3 minutes, consumes 25% of the caster's HP to create a protective shield with the same amount of HP consumed. Increases DEF and MDEF by (Job Level *  Rune Mastery  skill Level)/4. Has a chance to destroy weapons of attackers when receiving melee physical attacks. If the attacker is a monster, it reduces 25% ATK for 10 seconds. The protective shield will disappear when its HP goes to zero. This skill has no effect on  Boss  monsters. (This item has a maximum carry capacity of 60.)

name: Paint Brush
description: A brush which is wide and has a long hand grip. Exclusively for ground graffiti.

name: Wand of Occult
description: A shamanic wand topped with a goat's skull that enhances magic attack power. INT + 3, MATK + 105

name: Jacket
description: A jacket made out of mediocre leather.

name: Damascus
description: Rental Items A lethal knife made of a special metal that can easily cut straight into the heart of an enemy. Indestructible (except in upgrade attempts). Increases damage against small, medium, large size monsters by 40%.

name: Ragged Zombie Card
description: Increases physical and magical damage inflicted on  Demihuman  monsters by 1%. Critical +5 when attacking  Demihuman  monster. Random chance to inflict  Bleeding  status to the wearer. name: Hakujin
description: A dagger that has a shining white blade crafted of bone, and is designed for stabbing, rather than slashing. Add a 1% chance of auto casting  Level 1 Heal  on the user when attacking.

name: Wanderer Taming Box
description: A box with 10 skulls inside. Taming item for 'Wanderer'. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Assumptio Scroll Lv 5
description: Not Available [iRO Description] A scroll in which a single use of Level 5 Assumptio has been recorded. Caution-- This item won't work while your character is casting a spell or skill. Account Bound

name: Gajomart Card
description: Receive 10% more Experience Points from Plant monsters. Receive 20% more damage from Plant monster. More Information on Combo: Saehrimnir Gloves[1] & Gajomart Card

name: Rafflesia Card
description: Reduce damage from Fish monster by 30%.

name: Padded Armor
description: Armor constructed of solid metal plates that have been padded on the inside for comfort. [ Padded Armor & Armor Charm Equip Set ] More Information on Combo: Padded Armor[1] & Armor Charm

name: F Convex Mirror  / Convex Mirror
description: This item will be discontinued from sale starting on June 21, 2011 A clean convex mirror that can be used to detect the appearance of Boss Monsters exists in the map.  The effect has a 10 minute duration, the effect is cancelled once the player leaves the map or logs out. Lord of the Dead, boss monsters in the Bio Lab, Ktullanux, Memory of Thanatos and some other event MVP monsters can not be detected by using this item.

name: Undershirt
description: Lightweight armor made from 100% real cotton that is actually quite durable. MDEF + 1 [ + Pantie ] AGI + 5, FLEE +10 More Information on Combo: Pantie & Undershirt Pantie[1] & Undershirt

name: Panzer Goblin Card
description: Inflict 10% more damage with Critical attacks. Critical Rate + 7 on Demon monster.

name: Jack be Dandy
description: A pair of glasses that are worn on the head for a more charming appearance, instead of vision related purposes.

name: Zealotus Mask
description: This mask, which is symbolic of Zherlthsh, mistress of the Glast Heim Underground Prison, makes its wearer feel like looking down on normal human peons. Inflicts 5% more damage on  DemiHuman  monster. Reduces 5% damage taken from  DemiHuman  monster.
item_script: { bonus2 bAddRace,RC_DemiHuman,5; bonus2 bAddRace,RC_Player_Human,5; bonus2 bSubRace,RC_DemiHuman,5; bonus2 bSubRace,RC_Player_Human,5; },{},{}

name: XM Kitty Set Box  / Kitty Set Box
description: A box contains 1 White Drooping Cat,Gray Drooping Cat,Pink Drooping Cat,Blue Drooping Cat,Yellow Drooping Cat. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: K.H's Letter
description: A letter written by a man with the initials K.H., for a woman named Allysia. "Please don't believe in James, I'm sure he is lying. I am the one that really loves you. I may be poor now, but once I succeed in this reseach, I can become even richer than him! I beg you, come and see me tonight where we first met. I'll be waiting for you. --K.H. August 19"

name: Undead Elemental Scroll
description: A scroll endowed with undead elemental magic. When used, grants 20% resistance to  Fire ,  Water ,  Wind , and  Earth  property attacks for 5 minutes.

name: E Bubble Gum  / Bubble Gum
description: This item is impossible to deal with another account. Reward from Event Tasty and sweet bubble gum. Within the 30 minutes duration after eating it, Item drop rate increase by 100% for 30 minutes.

name: A Piece Of Cloth Of A Saint  / Saint's Clothing Piece
description: Traces of a cloth which has been worn by a Saint.

name: Icarus Wings
description: A brooch shaped like beautiful white wings for the Icarus members. Max SP + 50, DEX + 3 [ Renown Archer's Scarf & Feather of Icarus Equip Set ] More Information on Combo: Feather of Icarus & Renown Archer's Scarf

name: Waghnak
description: A common, yet effective claw that's also known as the "Tiger Fang".

name: Wand
description: A rough-hewn wand that's effective enough for the casting of magic spells. INT + 1, MATK + 45

name: Necklace
description: An ancient necklace. VIT + 1

name: Zealotus Egg
description: An egg in which a Zherlthsh Cute Pet rests. Can be hatched by using a  Pet Incubator .  Increases physical and magical damage inflicted on DemiHuman by 2%.

name: Queen's Coronet
description: A symbol of authority of high ranked women. Has a regal sense of feeling. Applicable Pet :  Medusa

name: Calender July  / July Calendar
description: A calender with 'July' word written on it. The beginning of exiting summer holidays.

name: Daenggie
description: A braided pigtail that has been cut from the head of a young girl.

name: Macapuno
description: A jar of "Macapuno" made from young coconut meat cooked in sugar syrup.

name: Necklace  / Rental Necklace
description: Rental Items A necklace once worn by an ancient queen that enhances the vitality of whoever wears it. VIT + 4

name: Safety Boots
description: Light, sturdy shoes with steel covers to protect its wearer's feet from harm. Impossible to refine this item.

name: Occult Incense
description: An incense bag which is carried to ward off evil. INT + 1, AGI + 1

name: Rabbit Earplugs  / Rabbit Earmuffs
description: Celebrate the year of the rabbit and keep your ears warm at the same time. ATK +4%, MATK +4%.

name: Yellow Bijou
description: A beautiful green bijou that totally captivates the eye and mind. In the East, people believe that this bijou can help wishes come true.

name: Abrasive 5 Box
description: A box containing 5 Abrasive. For 5 minutes, the player will receive +30 Critical Rate. This rate is doubled by Katar weapons. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Quagmire Scroll 50 Box  / Quagmire Scroll Box(50)
description: A box containing 50 Quagmire Scroll. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: XM Deviruchi Set Box  / Class Set Card Album
description: A box contains 1 Red Deviruchi Hat,White Deviruchi Hat,Gray Deviruchi Hat. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: E Battle Manual
description: Not Available [iRO Description] This well written, detailed manual explains effective battle methods. Account Bound Class:  Stat Boost Increases the rate of experience gained by 150% for 30 minutes.

name: I Respect You  / Respect
description: A cushion embroidered with the words 'I respect you'. Today's saying is written on the back. 'The more you hurry, the more you go back.'

name: Oath Day Letter
description: "Kami putra dan putri Indonesia mengaku.bertanah air satu, tanah air Indonesia. Kami putra dan putri Indonesia mengaku.berbangsa satu, bangsa Indonesia. Kami putra dan putri Indonesia mengaku. berbahasa satu, bahasa Indonesia" ...

name: Necklace Box
description: A box containing 1 Refined Necklace. Rental period for 7 days. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Adrenaline Scroll
description: Not Available [iRO Description] Not Available

name: Gae Bolg
description: A spear created from the body of a dead giant sea creature, topped with a jagged blade that leaves deep wounds. Pierces physical defense of  Dragon  monster. Increases physical damage on  Boss  monster by 10%. [ Gaebolg & Dragon's Breath Equip Set ] More Information on Combo: Gae Bolg[2] & Dragon Breath[1]  Gae Bolg[2] , Dragon Breath[1] & Dragon Helm[1]

name: Ulfhedinn
description: A mysterious cape with a protective spell that can convert the wearer's magic defense to physical defense. Has a chance to reduce physical damage taken by 20% and increases magical damage taken by 20% for 2 seconds when wearer receiving magical attack.

name: Wand
description: A rough-hewn wand that's effective enough for the casting of magic spells. INT + 1, MATK + 45

name: I Love China  / I LOVE CHINA
description: A heart pounding hat that shows the love for China. DEX +3 Increase resistance against Demihuman monster by 10%. Unrefineable

name: Lance
description: A spear that is commonly used by mounted knights.

name: A Picture Of Minstrel Song  / A Picture Of Maestro Song
description: A picture of Maestro Song that was taken in front of Thanatos tower. Written on the back is 'I want to have a Teddy Bear. I need 33?'.

name: Jam Pancake
description: Fragrant pancake with jam. Tasty babushkino strawberry jam - as in the childhood. Cures Poison, Curse, Silence, Confusion, Blind and Illusion (Hallucination). Recovers HP and SP .
item_script: { itemheal rand(325,405),rand(40,60); sc_end SC_POISON; sc_end SC_SILENCE; sc_end SC_BLIND; sc_end SC_CONFUSION; sc_end SC_CURSE; sc_end SC_Hallucination; },{},{}

name: Kabuki Mask
description: Traditional art mask from far eastern country. Increase resistance to  Silence  status by 30%.

name: Valentine Pledge  / Valentine's Emblem
description: A special emblem that is given to the most popular character. ATK +5%, MATK +3%.    All Stats +2, FLEE +10 ASPD +1, MDEF +3.  Increases effect of Heal, Potion Pitcher and recovery class Potions by 10% when they are cast by the wearer.

name: Mace
description: A flanged, solid club that is effective for simple smashing.

name: Zargon
description: A small crystallization created by some monsters.

name: Zeny Pet Egg Scroll Box
description: A box containing 1 Zeny Pet Egg Scroll. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Dagger of Counter Box
description: A box containing 1 Refined Dagger of Counter. Please take a care because is fragile. Rental period for 7 days. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Ice Falchion
description: An one-handed, formal dress sword imbued with the  Water  Property. Enables use of  Level 3 Cold Bolt . Has a 1% chance of auto casting  Level 3 Cold Bolt  on the enemy when dealing physical attack. Has a 5% chance to  Freeze  enemies when dealing physical attack. Has a 0.1% chance to  Freeze  its  user  by 0.1% chance when dealing physical attack.
item_script: { bonus bAtkEle,Ele_Water; bonus2 bAddEff,Eff_Freeze,500; bonus2 bAddEff2,Eff_Freeze,100; skill "MG_COLDBOLT",3; bonus3 bAutoSpell,"MG_COLDBOLT",3,100; },{},{}

description: Maximum HP -40% Maximum SP +50% Add a 2% chance of gaining 'Banana' each time a monster is killed. Double Banana's healing rate.

description: Knife used for stabbing.

name: Cake Hat
description: A birthday cake replica that won't fit a Dancer inside, but it's almost just as much fun to wear it on top of your head. Almost.

description: The aged lady, Yaga always carries this. It has the marks of being rubbed off.

name: Pantie
description: A risky undergarment that is comfortable to wear, but offers very little in the way of defense. [ Undershirt & Pantie Equip Set ] More Information on Combo: Pantie & Undershirt Pantie & Undershirt[1]  Pantie & Etran Shirt[1]

description: A beautiful wing fragment of a large insect. Gorgeous colors are displayed between the torn hide.

description: This item is impossible to deal with another account. Reward from Event An abrasive that adds sharpness to a weapon. Gives CRIT +30 for 5 minutes.

description: The adventurers who are brave the item which is provided from the hazard adventurer guild. Increases damage by 50%. Impossible to refine this item.

description: A box containing 5 Yellow Butterfly Wing. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

description: Babayaga's silver spoon stolen by pirates.

description: A risky undergarment that is comfortable to wear, but offers very little in the way of defense. [ Undershirt & Pantie Equip Set ] More Information on Combo: Pantie[1] & Undershirt Pantie[1] & Undershirt[1]

description: This well written, detailed manual explains effective battle methods. EXP rate increases to 150% for 30 minutes. This item is character bound. 180% for 30 minutes until 12/13/2011

name: Quagmire Scroll  / Quagmire scroll
description: Scroll that has the record of using  Level 5 Quagmire . Attention! This items won't work while above of 4X4 areas. Caution-- This item won't work while your character is casting a spell or skill.

name: Padded Armor
description: Armor constructed of solid metal plates that have been padded on the inside for comfort. [ Padded Armor & Armor Charm Equip Set ] More Information on Combo: Padded Armor & Armor Charm

name: Zeny Pet Egg Scroll
description: A scroll which gives you a random of amount zeny.

name: Hair Brush
description: A red comb stuck in the hair. CRIT + 6

name: Vacation Hat
description: A hat recommended to use for vacations. It helps to protect your face from strong sunshine. VIT + 1 Impossible to refine this item.

name: Bacillus
description: Aerobic bacteria. Often resides on metal chains.

name: Mace
description: A flanged, solid club that is effective for simple smashing.

name: Sacred Incense
description: An incense bag which is carried to avoid bad things. STR + 1, LUK + 1

name: Kafra Card 30 Box  / Kafra Card Box(30)
description: A box containing 30 Kafra Card. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Ulle's Cap
description: A woolen hunting cap once worn by Ulle, god of hunting. Just wearing it makes you feel like you can hunt down any beast. DEX + 2, AGI + 1. [ + Odin's Blessing ] [ Base Dexterity >= 70 ] Reduce SP Consumption of skills by 10%. More Information on Combo: Odin's Blessing[1] & Ulle's Cap

name: Odin Mask
description: A mask worn once worn by Odin during a fierce battle between the gods and humans.   Reduces damage taken from Boss monsters by 2%.  (Select to show Pre-RE or iRO description for different effect).

name: Academy Graduating Cap  / Magician Grad Hat
description: It's offer to you after the Academy. INT +2, DEX +2 Randomly autocasts Level 1 Assumptio owhen receiving magical attack.

name: Kafra Band
description: The most recognizable piece of the standard Kafra Employee uniform. MDEF + 3

name: XM Softcore Set Box  / Softcore Set Box
description: A box which contains 5 Battle Manual,5 Life Insurance,5 Bubble Gum. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Oblivion Curse
description: A poison that causes loss of memory. For 300 seconds causes the target to suffer from amnesia. While in amnesia it blocks natural SP recovery, and cannot be canceled via lex divinia or green potion. While in this status you cannot use any skills.

name: Observer
description: An equipment can check energy. Look like where come from another world. Enables use of  Level 1 Sense .   When VIP status is active:   All Stats +1

name: Parade Hat
description: A blessed hat, you will hear a holy sonance when you equip it. Because of the celestial benison, an angel will appear whenever you are under attack. MDEF +2 Increases tolerance to Stun by 10%. When being physically attacked, has a chance of auto-casting Level 5 Angelus or Level 1 Assumptio on self. If the user is an Acolyte or Acolyte upper classes, will auto-cast Level 1 Lex Aeterna when using Heal Skill on target.
item_script: { bonus bMdef,2; bonus4 bAutoSpellWhenHit,"AL_ANGELUS",5,30,0; bonus4 bAutoSpellWhenHit,"HP_ASSUMPTIO",1,1,0; bonus2 bResEff,Eff_Stun,1000; if (BaseClass == Job_Acolyte) bonus4 bAutoSpellOnSkill,"AL_HEAL","PR_LEXAETERNA",1,1000; },{},{}

name: Zaha Doll Hat
description: A doll resemble to fairy 'Baek-so-jin'. INT +3, MDEF +9. Increase magical damage inflicted on  Undead  monsters by 10%. Add a low chance to transform into Bacsojin for 3 seconds when receiving or dealing magic attacks. While in transform state: MATK increases by 30 * Refine Level. Fixed cast time  reduces by 0.08 seconds * Refine Level. Drain 10 SP per second.
item_script: expand to view script  { bonus bInt,3; bonus bMdef,9; bonus2 bMagicAddRace,RC_Undead,10; .@t = 2+(getrefine()/3)*1000; autobonus "{ .@r = max(1,getrefine()); bonus bMatk,30*.@r; bonus bFixedCast,-80*.@r; bonus2 bSPLossRate,10,1000; }",15,.@t,BF_MAGIC,"{ active_transform 1518,3000; specialeffect2 EF_POTION_BERSERK; showscript \"This is my magic Power!\"; }"; autobonus2 "{ .@r = max(1,getrefine()); bonus bMatk,30*.@r; bonus bFixedCast,-80*.@r; bonus2 bSPLossRate,10,1000; }",15,.@t,BF_MAGIC,"{ active_transform 1518,3000; specialeffect2 EF_POTION_BERSERK; showscript \"How dare you! I punish you to endless sleep!\"; }"; },{},{}

name: Pagdayaw

name: Cacao
description: A nut from the Cacao tree that is naturally found in warm climes. It must be dried into cacao beans, fried and then ground to become cacao paste. Chocolate is made by solidifying the cacao paste with milk. The fat extracted from the cacao paste is used as cacao butter, so it's not ready to eat yet.

description: The cap which makes you look better in the fest. Adds chance of auto casting  Level 5 Tarot Card Of Fate  on the enemy when attacking.

name: Mage Book Basic

name: Gaia Whip

name: Rafflecino

description: A calender with 'February' word written on it. It's the month of giving and receiving chocolate.

name: W Doll Hat Box
description: A box which contains 1 W Doll Hat. So hot! A headgear with the figure of Kafra W! description: A box containing 5 Yellow Butterfly Wing.  Allows teleportation to any Rune-Midgarts city. Available cities are Prontera, Geffen, Payon, Morroc, Aldebaran, and Alberta. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

description: A bow made famous by its use by Goongso, a legendary Korean archer that used this bow's power to smite his enemies.

name: Jamadhar
description: A specially made katar with two blades that move like scissors to reveal a third blade from within.

description: A cute pet Baby Desert Wolf exchange coupon. You can exchange this coupon with cute pet Baby Desert Wolf by talking to trader in Prontera and Alberta.

name: Odin's Blessing
description: The main component of the Hermod Armor set. [ Odin's Blessing, Stone Buckler & Magni's Cap Equip Set ] [ Odin's Blessing, Valkyrja's Shield & Frigg's Circlet Equip Set ] [ Odin's Blessing, Falcon Muffler & Fricco's Shoes Equip Set ] [ Odin's Blessing, Vidar's Boots & Vali's Manteau Equip Set ] [ Odin's Blessing & Ulle's Cap Equip Set ] More Information on Combo: Stone Buckler[1] , Odin's Blessing[1] & Magni's Cap Valkyrja's Shield[1] , Odin's Blessing[1] & Frigg's Circlet Neo Valkyrja's Shield, Odin's Blessing[1] & Frigg's Circlet Odin's Blessing[1] , Fricco's Shoes & Falcon Muffler Odin's Blessing[1] , Vidar's Boots & Vali's Manteau Odin's Blessing[1] & Ulle's Cap[1]  Odin's Blessing[1] & Ulle's Cap

name: Hair Band
description: A simple hair band that holds hair in place quite neatly. It's a very cute look for girls, but dudes, on the other hand. Impossible to refine this item.

name: Obeaune Card
description: Enables use of  Level 1 Cure . More Information on Combo: Obeaune Card & Iara Card

name: Langka
description: A jar of "Langka" made of sweetened Jackfruit.

name: Valhalla's Flower  / Valhala's Flower
description: An enigmantic flower that can only be seen within Valhalla, the sacred battlegrounds of the ancient gods.

name: Baby Desert Wolf Egg
description: An egg in which a Baby Desert Wolf Cute Pet rests. Can be hatched by using a  Pet Incubator . INT + 1, MaxSP +50.

name: Quagmire Scroll 50 Box  / Quagmire Scroll Box(50)
description: A box containing 50 Quagmire Scroll. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Cactus Needle
description: A sharp needle from a Muka cactus monster.

name: Ice Amulet  / Ice Charm
description: Ninjas are commonly seen carrying around these talisman for protection. Advanced ninjas can use the talisman to perform various magic skills.

name: Nagan
description: An one-handed sword topped with several extra edges for making wounds deeper and more unsightly. Increases physical damage against  DemiHuman  monster by 5%. Enables use of  Level 5 Double Attack .

name: Vacation Ticket
description: A ticket which allows its owner to apply for a summer vacation event.

name: Radio Antenna
description: A hat designed to transmit electric waves. Sometimes it receives electric waves from external worlds. MDEF + 5, CRIT + 5, FLEE + 5 Enables use of  Level 1 Lightning Bolt . Adds a chance autocast  Level 5 Thunder Storm  when dealing physical attack (script is when receiving physical attack).
item_script: { bonus bMdef,5; bonus bCritical,5; bonus bFlee,5; skill "MG_LIGHTNINGBOLT",1; bonus4 bAutoSpell,"MG_THUNDERSTORM",5,30,1; },{},{}

name: Abrasive 10 Box
description: A box containing 10 Abrasive. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Tail Whip
description: A whip fashioned out of an animal's tail that is said to bring good luck. LUK + 3

name: Jade Plate
description: A broken jade that seems valuable, no one knows who it belongs to.

name: Jamadhar
description: Rental Items A specially made katar with two blades that move like scissors to reveal a third blade from within. Increases physical damage against  Small, Medium and Large  size monsters by 40%.  When VIP status is active: ATK +10, MATK +10.
item_script: { bonus bUnbreakableWeapon; bonus2 bAddSize,Size_All,40; if (vip_status(VIP_STATUS_ACTIVE)) { bonus bBaseAtk,10; bonus bMatk,10; } },{},{}

name: Valentine's Emblem Box
description: A prize that is given to the hottest character who is the winner of the Valentine's Day event.

name: Zealotus Card
description: LUK + 2 Inflict 10% more damage with Throw Arrow and Musical Strike. [ Injustice Card Combo ] More Information on Combo: Injustice Card & Zherlthsh Card
item_script: { bonus bLuk,2; bonus2 bSkillAtk,"BA_MUSICALSTRIKE",10; bonus2 bSkillAtk,"DC_THROWARROW",10; },{},{}

name: Sacred Mission
description: A symbolic shield, rumored to have been given from God to his messenger. INT + 2, VIT + 3, MDEF + 3 Indestructible (except in upgrade attempts).
item_script: { bonus bVit,3; bonus bInt,2; bonus bMdef,3; bonus bUnbreakableShield; },{},{}

name: Jade Trinket  / Jade Ornament
description: Oriental accessory that is made of a mysterious green stone. Applicable Pet :  Wicked Nymph

name: Calender April  / April Calendar
description: A calender with 'April' word written on it. There is day when people plant trees for the blue planet.

name: Jack o' Pumpkin
description: A pumpkin with a carved, spooky face.

name: Yellow Bandana  / Air Pirate's Bandana
description: A piece of yellow cloth that has droplets of blood, rumored to be from the shirts of the protesters who were at the Bloodless Revolution. LUK + 2, VIT + 2 Reduces damage from Long Range attacks by 10%.
item_script: { bonus bLuk,2; bonus bVit,2; bonus bLongAtkDef,10; },{},{}

name: Caesar's Sword
description: An one-handed sword which looks just like a pair of scissors. Increases physical damage inflicted on  Plant  monster by 25%. Pierces physical defense of  Plant  monster.

name: Baby Chick Hat Box  / Chick Hat Box
description: A box contains 1 Baby Chick. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.

name: Octopus Hat
description: Ridiculous Octopus with a gentleman's hat. It feels like it's making fun of me as I look at it. MDEF +3  Add low chance of auto casting  Level 5 Provoke  on the enemy when attacking. Indestructible (except in upgrade attempts).
item_script: { bonus bMdef,3; bonus3 bAutoSpell,"SM_PROVOKE",5,10; bonus bUnbreakableHelm; },{},{}

name: Vagabond Wolf Card
description: STR + 1 [ + Wolf Card ] FLEE +18 More Information on Combo: Wolf Card & Vagabond Wolf Card

name: Necklace
description: A necklace once worn by an ancient queen that enhances the vitality of whoever wears it. VIT + 2

name: Valentine's Day Firecracker
description: Phrase 'HAPPY VALENTINE's DAY!' pops out with Fire cracker. Flammable. Keep out of reach of children.

name: Rabbit Bonnet
description: A bonnet made to resemble a rabbit. Despite it's cute appearance this hat gives its wearer attack strength. ATK +10, MATK +10 Reduces damage taken from  Demihuman  monsters by 3%. Reduces after cast delay by 3%. Refine Level  +7  or higher: Reduces damage taken from elemental attack by 5%.
item_script: { bonus bBaseAtk,10; bonus bMatk,10; bonus2 bSubRace,RC_DemiHuman,3; bonus2 bSubRace,RC_Player_Human,3; bonus bDelayrate,-3; if (getrefine()>6) { bonus2 bSubEle,Ele_All,5; } },{},{}

name: Kafra Card 30 Box  / Kafra Card Box(30)
description: A box containing 30 Kafra Cards. Kafra Card - Kafra will be in service when used. Once this item is purchased, termination of contract is impossible. Also, this item is not refundable.
